text: Valeriya Mykhaylivna Strakhova (; born 9 June 1995) is a Ukrainian tennis player. ==Career== On 1 February 2016, she achieved her career-high singles ranking of world No. 231. On 24 October 2016, she peaked at No. 164 in the doubles rankings. Strakhova has won 12 singles and 16 doubles titles on the ITF Circuit. Strakhova made her WTA Tour main-draw debut at the 2015 BRD Bucharest Open in the doubles event, partnering Anastasiya Vasylyeva. ==ITF Circuit finals== ===Singles: 16 (12 titles, 4 runner–ups)=== {|
